title: Chainlink External Adapter for Uniswap V3
description: This adapter allows querying Uniswap V3 contracts

ETHEREUM_RPC_URL.description: An http(s) RPC URL to a blockchain node that can read the Uniswap V3 contracts

RPC_URL.description: A fallback http(s) RPC URL to a backup blockchain node that can read the UniswapV2 contracts

BLOCKCHAIN_NETWORK.description: The network to get pre-defined token addresses from. NOTE: THIS SHOULD NOT BE CHANGED ON ETHEREUM MAINNET

QUOTER_CONTRACT.description: The address of the Uniswap V3 address quoter contract. NOTE: THIS SHOULD NOT BE CHANGED ON ETHEREUM MAINNET

DEFAULT_FEE_TIERS.description: The Uniswap V3 fee tiers amount
